name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **CI/CD**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and **API development**. Proven expertise in developing scalable microservices and cloud-native applications using **FastAPI**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**. Adept at implementing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) strategies and automating workflows with **Argo** and **Airflow**. 

Skilled in both frontend and backend development, leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. Strong background in building high-performance applications that meet stringent compliance standards, including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Experienced in deploying AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and automation, utilizing tools for MLOps such as **MLflow**, and orchestrating workflows with **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and implemented **CI/CD** pipelines for mobile applications leveraging **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring high-quality automated testing and seamless deployment workflows across **development** and **production** environments.
• Designed and built microservices architectures utilizing **Docker**, **Kubernetes** (AKS/EKS), and **AWS Lambda**, fostering fault-tolerant and scalable deployments within complex systems.
• Engineered API solutions using **Python** with **FastAPI**, ensuring efficient integration with frontend frameworks and adhering to industry standards like HIPAA and GDPR.
• Created robust infrastructure as code implementations with **Terraform**, enabling consistent environment setup and management across cloud platforms including **Azure** and **AWS**.
• Led implementation of automated testing strategies for various application layers, employing tools such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest** to enhance reliability and performance metrics.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal performance of **API** development processes, supporting real-time data exchange and comprehensive analytics in **healthcare** and **fintech** domains.
• Conducted the transformation of legacy systems into microservices, optimizing application architecture for **scalability** and **maintainability**.
• Managed deployment and orchestration of applications using **Argo** for enhanced monitoring and control over application flows.
• Developed data pipelines and workflows using **Airflow**, facilitating efficient data workflow management across various sources for analytics and validation processes.
• Designed innovative backend inference systems integrating machine learning models powered by frameworks like **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, enhancing application capabilities.
• Generated comprehensive reports and visualizations employing **Power BI Embedded**, enabling stakeholders to gain insights from dynamic datasets and key performance indicators.
• Fostered a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing, mentoring team members on best practices in software development and infrastructure management.

• Developed and optimized **CI/CD** pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes using **Azure**, **AWS**, and **Terraform**, significantly reducing deployment time by **40%**.
• Migrated to a microservices architecture using **Python** (including **FastAPI**) and **Docker**, enhancing system scalability and maintainability while supporting high-volume transactions.
• Implemented robust **API development** practices to design and integrate services seamlessly, improving interoperability across applications and systems.
• Constructed real-time data ingestion and processing pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving batch and real-time processing efficiencies and reducing data latency by **30%**.
• Employed **Kubernetes** for orchestration of containerized applications ensuring optimal resource utilization and improved application reliability.
• Developed comprehensive automated testing strategies within the development lifecycle, increasing code coverage to **85%** and minimizing regression issues.
• Leveraged **Docker** to create consistent development and production environments, streamlining collaboration among teams and enhancing deployment efficiency.
• Participated in the design and implementation of Infrastructure as Code strategies, improving infrastructure consistency while reducing deployment errors.
• Worked on **Java** and other languages to contribute to backend services, utilizing microservices to enhance application modularity and maintainability.
• Regularly collaborated with cross-functional teams to align project goals, ensuring timely delivery of milestones and a shared understanding of technical requirements.

Utilized **Python** (FastAPI) to develop robust APIs and backend microservices, ensuring high availability and scalability for a global e-commerce platform.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, automating deployment processes and improving software delivery efficiency by **30%**.
Engineered automated testing strategies, enhancing the reliability of applications while decreasing bugs by **40%** pre-release.
Designed and maintained containerized applications with **Docker**, orchestrating the infrastructure using **Kubernetes** to support dynamic scaling and management of services.
Developed cloud-based solutions leveraging **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring optimal performance and cost efficiency for high-demand applications.
Created and implemented infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, streamlining environment management and consistency across deployments.
Integrated event-driven architecture with tools like **Argo** and **Airflow**, facilitating efficient data pipelines and workflow automation.
Collaborated on microservices architecture to enhance modularity and maintainability of the system, contributing to reduced response times in key modules by **25%**.
Worked alongside teams utilizing **Java** for cross-platform integrations, enhancing system interoperability.

- Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
- Engineered real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
- Developed frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
- Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
- Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
- Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
- Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
- Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
- Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
- Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
